title: ............求解。。霸王龙之类的恐龙怎么收复- -
author: gest20gest
txt_content: 。。。。。我找了各种帖子- -。我就没看见怎么收复恐龙。。本来有一头三角龙莫名其妙能骑。。现在也不行了。。求解- -。。。。希望下次发mod能不能把简单的各种操作都发一下。。

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: - -也许是mod本身的问题呢 你把原帖发来我可以去帮你找

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: 看說明, 只提到要"餵食"馴服, "長大"後才能騎...

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: gest20gest
replies.txt_content:
well 发表于 2011-10-7 17:23 
看說明, 只提到要"餵食"馴服, "長大"後才能騎...
我那个霸王龙已经成长到一口咬死我的地步了。。根本打不动它

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
--They can find ancient ferns or wheat (dropped on the ground) and feed themselves.(especially when they are hurt.)But you can still feed them with wheat(By right clicking).
--Have 3 subspecies.
--No horns while it is baby.
--Ride-able when adult(>4 MC days)
喂给他吃小麦 扔地上也行 成年后可以骑 （至少4个mc天 4天）

Riding
--Won't hungry and won't grow up.
--Control-able by rider.(players)
--It can help you do some construction work like flatting lands with rushing.
--Can simply run over mobs while rushing.
--Can rush by holding sneak button.
骑乘中不会饥饿不会长大
可以控制 破坏
可以踩怪物- -
按住蹲伏键可以跑

原帖： http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... ology-v49/#mobs_tag
